sentences: Izhak  Graziani (Hebrew: יצחק גרציאני (August 4, 1924 - July 7, 2003) was an Israeli music conductor.
In 1948, he immigrated to Israel and joined the  IDF Orchestra as a trumpet player.
Graziani played with the orchestra until 1952.
In 1960, after the retirement of conductor Shalom Ronli-Riklis, Graziani took his place.
Graziani was also Music Director of the Eurovision Song Contest 1979.
Graziani retired in 2003 and died three months later.
